name: 蘇益生
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解訊號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位訊號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法；(2)連續系統的數學分析；(3)離散系統的數學分析；(4)複利葉轉換分析；(5)拉氏轉換分析；(6)Z-轉換分析。
schedule:
Week 1 & 2: Introduction: Signals and Systems
Week 3: Linear Time-Invariant Systems 
Week 4 & 5: Fourier Series
Week 6: The Continuous-Time Fourier Transform 
Week 7 & 8: The Discrete-Time Fourier Transform
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Time and Frequency Characteristics
Week 11 & 12: Sampling
Week 13: Communication Systems
Week 14 & 15: The Laplace Transform
Week 16 & 17: The z-Transform
Week 18: Final Exam

The course schedule is subject to change on the basis of class progress.
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam: 25% 
Final Exam: 25%
Homework: 10%
Quiz: 40%

The grading policy is subject to change.
materials:
Textbook: 
A. V. Oppenheim, A. S. Willsky, and S. H. Nawab, "Signals and Systems," 2nd Ed., Pearson, 2016.

References:
1. M. J. Roberts, "Signals and Systems: Analysis Using Transform Methods and MATLAB," 3rd Ed., McGraw Hill, 2018.
2. L. B. Jackson, "Signals, Systems, and Transforms," Addison Wesley, 1990.
